• Curved surface area or surface area of a cone \(=\pi rl\); where \(r\) is its base radius and \(l\) its slant height.
  • Total surface area of a cone \(=\pi r (l+r)\); where \(r\) is its base radius and \(l\) its slant height.
  • Slant height of a cone, \(\,l = \sqrt{r^2+h^2}\); where \(r\) is its base radius and \(h\) is the height of the cone.
